verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5692><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> that Avraham <S%G11><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>, as pertaining <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, hath found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5760><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Avraham <S%G11><s%> were justified <S%G1344><s%> <S%G5681><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, he hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> whereof to glory <S%G2745><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> before <S%G4314><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%>? <S%G1161><s%> Avraham <S%G11><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5656><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> it was counted <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> to him that worketh <S%G2038><s%> <S%G5740><s%> is <S%G3049><s%> the reward <S%G3408><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> reckoned <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5736><s%> of <S%G2596><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> of <S%G2596><s%> debt <S%G3783><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to him that worketh <S%G2038><s%> <S%G5740><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him that justifieth <S%G1344><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the ungodly <S%G765><s%>, his <S%G846><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> is counted <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5736><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

Havahn as <S%G2509><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> describeth <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the blessedness <S%G3108><s%> of the man <S%G444><s%>, unto whom <S%G3739><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> imputeth <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5736><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>,

Saying, Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are they whose <S%G3739><s%> iniquities <S%G458><s%> are forgiven <S%G863><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> are covered <S%G1943><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.
Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is the man <S%G435><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> will <S%G3049><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> impute <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5667><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.

Cometh this <S%G3778><s%> blessedness <S%G3108><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the b'ritmilah <S%G4061><s%> only, or <S%G2228><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the unb'ritmilah <S%G203><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> we say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> was reckoned <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5681><s%> to Avraham <S%G11><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

How <S%G4459><s%> was it <S%G3049><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> reckoned <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5681><s%>? when he was <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> b'ritmilah <S%G4061><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> unb'ritmilah <S%G203><s%>? Not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> b'ritmilah <S%G4061><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> unb'ritmilah <S%G203><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he received <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the sign <S%G4592><s%> of b'ritmilah <S%G4061><s%>, a seal <S%G4973><s%> of the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of the faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> he had yet being <S%G1722><s%> uncircumcised <S%G203><s%>: that <S%G1519><s%> he <S%G846><s%> might be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> them that believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, though <S%G1223><s%> they be not circumcised <S%G203><s%>; that <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> might be imputed <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5683><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> of b'ritmilah <S%G4061><s%> to them who are not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the b'ritmilah <S%G4061><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> who also <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4748><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in the steps <S%G2487><s%> of that faith <S%G4102><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> Avraham <S%G11><s%>, which he had being <S%G1722><s%> yet uncircumcised <S%G203><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%>, that he should be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> the <S%G846><s%> heir <S%G2818><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, was not <S%G3756><s%> to Avraham <S%G11><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> they which are of <S%G1537><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> be heirs <S%G2818><s%>, faith <S%G4102><s%> is made void <S%G2758><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> made of none effect <S%G2673><s%> <S%G5769><s%>:

Because <S%G1063><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> worketh <S%G2716><s%> <S%G5736><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> Torah <S%G3551><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, there is no <S%G3761><s%> transgression <S%G3847><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> it is of <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> it might be by <S%G2596><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>; to the end <S%G1519><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> might be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> sure <S%G949><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the seed <S%G4690><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> to that only <S%G3440><s%> which is of <S%G1537><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to that also <S%G2532><s%> which is of <S%G1537><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of Avraham <S%G11><s%>; who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> of us <S%G2257><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>,

(As <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> I have made <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5758><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> a father <S%G3962><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%>,) before <S%G2713><s%> him whom <S%G3739><s%> he believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, even 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, who quickeneth <S%G2227><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> calleth <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5723><s%> those things which be <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> as though <S%G5613><s%> they were <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%>.

Who <S%G3739><s%> against <S%G3844><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>, that <S%G1519><s%> he <S%G846><s%> might become <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5635><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%>, according <S%G2596><s%> to that which was spoken <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, So <S%G3779><s%> shall <S%G2071><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> being not <S%G3361><s%> weak <S%G770><s%> <S%G5660><s%> in faith <S%G4102><s%>, he considered <S%G2657><s%> <S%G5656><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> dead <S%G3499><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, when he was <S%G5225><s%> <S%G5723><s%> about <S%G4225><s%> an hundred years old <S%G1541><s%>, neither yet <S%G2532><s%> the deadness <S%G3500><s%> of Sara's <S%G4564><s%> womb <S%G3388><s%>:

<S%G1161><s%> He staggered <S%G1252><s%> <S%G5681><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> through unbelief <S%G570><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> was strong <S%G1743><s%> <S%G5681><s%> in faith <S%G4102><s%>, giving <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5631><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> being fully persuaded <S%G4135><s%> <S%G5685><s%> that <S%G3754><s%>, what <S%G3739><s%> he had promised <S%G1861><s%> <S%G5766><s%>, he was <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> able <S%G1415><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to perform <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5658><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> therefore <S%G1352><s%> it was imputed <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5681><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G1125><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5648><s%> for his sake <S%G1223><s%> <S%G846><s%> alone <S%G3440><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> it was imputed <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5681><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>;

But <S%G235><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, to whom <S%G3739><s%> it shall be <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5719><s%> imputed <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5745><s%>, if we believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him that raised up <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5660><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>;

Who <S%G3739><s%> was delivered <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5681><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> offences <S%G3900><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was raised again <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5681><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> justification <S%G1347><s%>.
